1660480.name: Arausio
1660480.description:
Explore this accurate reconstitution of the ancient theatre of Arausio and solve the mystery: who destroyed the statue of the emperor Augustus? Meet numerous characters from the Roman antiquity and discover all about this incredible era of human history!

Or, if you’re in a calmer mood, simply do a virtual tour of the theatre.

Are you ready to dive into History?
1660480.supported_languages:
法语*, 英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
